mapper.sql: id, country, province_id, province, city, is_deleted
mapper.insert:
insert into city
id,
country,
province_id,
province,
city,
is_deleted,

mapper.update:
update city
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update city set country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
